articles.title: Brisbane star David Fifita to miss Broncos' NRL return match - Wide World of Sports
articles.description: Speculation rife he could be sidelined for months
articles.content:
Brisbane coach Anthony Seibold has refused to speculate on how long David Fifita will be sidelined by knee surgery, only conceding the back-rower will miss their NRL return match in May.

articles.title: Bryce Cotton quits the Perth Wildcats after NBL imposes coronavirus salary cuts - ABC News
articles.description: Perth Wildcats star Bryce Cotton has walked out on the final year of his contract with the club, citing unforeseen circumstances, after the NBL announced big pay cuts in response to the COVID-19 crisis.
articles.content:
Perth Wildcats star Bryce Cotton has walked out on the final year of his contract with the club, citing unforeseen circumstances. Key points:
